mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewno, r_title, r_content, r_file1, r_size1, r_thumb1, r_cnt, replycnt, rdate, rname, grpno, indent, ansnum, word, score, productno, customerno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(reviewno), 0)+1 as reviewno FROM review), #{r_title}, #{r_content}, #{r_file1}, #{r_size1}, #{r_thumb1}, #{r_cnt}, #{replycnt}, sysdate, #{rname}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(grpno), 0) + 1 as grpno FROM review), 0, 0, #{word}, #{score}, #{productno}, #{customerno})
mapper.select: SELECT reviewno, r_title, r_content, r_file1, r_size1, r_thumb1, r_cnt, replycnt, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as rdate, rname, grpno, indent, ansnum, word, score, productno, customerno FROM review ORDER BY reviewno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM review
SELECT reviewno, r_title, r_content, r_file1, r_size1, r_thumb1, r_cnt, replycnt, rdate, rname, grpno, indent, ansnum, word, score, productno, customerno FROM review WHERE reviewno = #{reviewno}

SELECT COUNT(*) as n_cnt FROM review
WHERE word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewno, productno, r_title, r_content, r_file1, r_size1, r_thumb1, r_cnt, replycnt, rdate, rname, grpno, word, indent, ansnum) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(reviewno), 0)+1 as reviewno FROM review), #{productno}, #{r_title}, #{r_content}, #{r_file1}, #{r_size1}, #{r_thumb1}, #{r_cnt}, #{replycnt}, sysdate, #{rname}, #{grpno}, #{word}, #{indent}, #{ansnum})
